movies.title: Thirst
movies.plot: Four people, isolated in their different ways are trapped in the desert and changed forever. Against impossible odds, can they find meaning - life, laughter and love before it is too late?
movies.simplePlot: Four people, isolated in their different ways are trapped in the desert and changed forever. Against impossible odds, can they find meaning - life, laughter and love before it is too late?

biography.placeOfBirth: Leningrad, RSFSR, USSR [now St. Petersburg, Russia]
biography.bio: Victoria Haralabidou was born on October 23, 1971 in Leningrad, RSFSR, USSR. She is an actress, known for Les mariées (2004), Psyhi vathia (2009) and Blessed (2009).
biography.name: Victoria Haralabidou

biography.bio: Myles Pollard was born on November 4, 1972 in Perth, Western Australia, Australia. He is an actor and producer, known for McLeod's Daughters (2001), X-Men Origins: Wolverine (2009) and Tucker & Dale fightent le mal (2010). He has been married to Brigitta Wuthe since October 2006. They have one child.
biography.name: Myles Pollard

biography.bio: Thom Green is an actor, known for Halo 4: Forward Unto Dawn (2012), Camp (2013) and Dance Academy (2010).
biography.name: Thom Green

biography.bio: Hanna Mangan Lawrence was born on March 5, 1991. She is an actress, known for X: Night of Vengeance (2011), Beyond the Reach (2014) and Bed of Roses (2008).
biography.name: Hanna Mangan Lawrence

filmingLocations.location: Broken Hill, New South Wales, Australia

awards.award: Film Critics Circle of Australia Awards 2013

categories.category: Best Performance by a Young Actor
